Description: This corpus contains articles from Europeana newspapers for the following time periods: 1811-1856 for the Dutch subcorpus, 1871-1916 for the French subcorpus, and 1926 for the German subcorpus. #SEPThe corpus is available for download from the KB Lab.
This corpus contains articles from newsfeed from 2014 to 2017.#SEPThe corpus is available through noSketchEingine.
